ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Training Points and Platinum
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is not always a small fee for training.  There is a small fee (progressively larger) to train after a certain skill level. And I m pretty sure you
ygData.messageBody:
> From: <alexander.jones@...>
>
> You cannot train anything higher than 21 from your guildtrainer. He always
> charges a small fee to train you (this is very minimal if you train from 0
> to 1 and go out and learn the rest on your own.)

There is not "always" a small fee for training. There is a small fee
(progressively larger) to train after a certain skill level.

And I'm pretty sure you can train any skill (minus tradeskills and languages)
over the 21 skill limit, if you have the money to do so.

Erik Johnson
